import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import styles from "./Home.module.css" import { dbService, storageService } from "fbase"; const Home = (userObj) => { const [user, setUser] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { dbService.collection("User").onSnapshot((snapshot) => { const userArray = snapshot.docs.map((doc) => ({ id: doc.id, ...doc.data(), })); setUser(userArray); }); }, []); console.log(dbService.collection("User").doc(userObj.uid)) return(
